item.title: I invested $200K in my daughter’s 529 plan. She doesn’t want to go to college. What should I do with this money?
item.description: “Are there any other ways I can consider transferring the wealth to her?”

item.title: ‘He lives paycheck to paycheck’: My husband pays his bills late and sits at home playing on his computer. How do I fix it?
item.description: “He seems to think ‘bill due’ dates are a suggestion. He has literally no savings.”

item.title: Jobless claims data isn’t as bleak as Challenger report suggests
item.description: U.S. jobless claims rose last week but didn’t spike, according to investment banks crunching state-level data.

item.title: I’m 83 and have a monthly income of $3,800. My estranged wife wants me to join her in Colombia. Do I go?
item.description: “I have about $220,000 in savings and I have close to $300,000 in equity if I sell the house.”

item.title: Airbnb suggests consumers are starting to feel better about taking vacations. Here’s why profits could still take a hit.
item.description: Vacation-rental platform Airbnb Inc. on Thursday said demand held up through October and forecast fourth-quarter sales that were above expectations, b...
